Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

I currently have the custom DPI settings windows turned up to 300% because of my bad eyesight. However the close button on each tab remains at its normal size, and remains tiny compared to everything else. The effect is that it takes 10 seconds of mouse aiming and cursing every time I want to close a tab :-/
See screenshot attached

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Right click desktop -> personalize -> make text or other items larger
2. Set custom DPI
3. Open tabs

Actual Results:  
Tab close button remains at 100% size, with a large amount of empty space around it

Expected Results:  
scales to 300%
